snippet: The show, which imagined post-nuclear war life in a Kansas, was canceled in 2008. But, much the way Netflix is bringing back "Arrested Development," it is in talks to make more episodes of "Jericho."
abstract: The show, which imagined post-nuclear war life in a Kansas, was canceled in 2008. But, much the way Netflix is bringing back "Arrested Development," it is in talks to make more episodes of "Jericho."

headline.main: Netflix May Resurrect 'Jericho,' Canceled CBS Drama
